text: Jean David Meneses Villarroel (born March 16, 1993 in Quillota, Chile), is a Chilean footballer currently playing for Liga MX club León and the Chile national team. ==Career== In March 2018, he came to international attention for his blatant dive to win a late penalty, which was converted for a 2-1 victory against rivals Colo-Colo in the Chilean Primera Division. On 1 August 2018, Meneses was loaned out to Club León for the rest of the season. In May 2019 it was confirmed, that Club León had redeemed the player and he would stay at the club.León pagó 1.7 MDD por la carta del chileno Jean Meneses, mexico.as.com, 15 May 2019 ==International== He made his Chile national football team debut on 10 September 2019 in a friendly against Honduras. He started the game and was substituted in the 64th minute. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Chile's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! No. !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !!
